nlp.name: nlp
nlp.description: Natural Language Processing (NLP) tasks are the application of computational techniques to the analysis and synthesis of natural language and speech.

entity_recognition.name: entity_recognition
entity_recognition.description: Identifying and categorizing key entities within the text, such as names, dates, or locations.
entity_recognition.caption: Entity Recognition

ethical_interaction.name: ethical_interaction
ethical_interaction.description: Capabilities for ensuring ethical, unbiased, and safe content generation and interaction.
ethical_interaction.caption: Ethical and Safe Interaction

named_entity_recognition.name: named_entity_recognition
named_entity_recognition.description: Task to recognize names as entity, for example, people, locations, buildings, and so on.
named_entity_recognition.caption: Named Entity Recognition

summarization.name: summarization
summarization.description: Condensing longer texts into concise summaries while preserving essential information and maintaining coherence.
summarization.caption: Text Summarization

token_classification.name: token_classification
token_classification.description: Capabilities for classifying individual tokens or words within text.
token_classification.caption: Token Classification

paraphrasing.name: paraphrasing
paraphrasing.description: Rewriting text to express the same ideas using different words and structures while maintaining the original meaning.
paraphrasing.caption: Text Paraphrasing

pos_tagging.name: pos_tagging
pos_tagging.description: Tagging each part of a sentence as nouns, adjectives, verbs, and so on.
pos_tagging.caption: Part-of-Speech Tagging

dialogue_generation.name: dialogue_generation
dialogue_generation.description: Producing conversational responses that are contextually relevant and engaging within a dialogue context.
dialogue_generation.caption: Dialogue Generation

personalization.name: personalization
personalization.description: Capabilities for adapting and personalizing content based on user context and preferences.
personalization.caption: Personalisation and Adaptation

multilingual_understanding.name: multilingual_understanding
multilingual_understanding.description: Recognizing and processing text in multiple languages.
multilingual_understanding.caption: Multilingual Understanding

question_generation.name: question_generation
question_generation.description: Automatically generating relevant and meaningful questions from a given text or context.
question_generation.caption: Question Generation

nlu.name: nlu
nlu.description: Natural Language Understanding (NLU) focuses on the ability to interpret and comprehend human language, including understanding context, semantics, and identifying key entities within text.
nlu.caption: Natural Language Understanding

knowledge_synthesis.name: knowledge_synthesis
knowledge_synthesis.description: Capability to aggregate and combine information from multiple sources, creating comprehensive and coherent responses while maintaining context and relevance.
knowledge_synthesis.caption: Knowledge Synthesis

storytelling.name: storytelling
storytelling.description: Creating narratives, stories, or fictional content with creativity and coherence.
storytelling.caption: Storytelling

creative_content.name: creative_content
creative_content.description: Capabilities for generating various forms of creative content, including narratives, poetry, and other creative writing forms.
creative_content.caption: Creative Content Generation

feature_extraction.name: feature_extraction
feature_extraction.description: Capabilities for extracting and representing textual features as vectors for downstream tasks.
feature_extraction.caption: Feature Extraction

bias_mitigation.name: bias_mitigation
bias_mitigation.description: Reducing or eliminating biased language and ensuring fair and unbiased output.
bias_mitigation.caption: Bias Mitigation

natural_language_inference.name: natural_language_inference
natural_language_inference.description: Classifying the relation between two texts, like a contradiction, entailment, and others.
natural_language_inference.caption: Natural Language Inference

text_completion.name: text_completion
text_completion.description: Continuing a given text prompt in a coherent and contextually appropriate manner to generate fluent and contextually relevant content.
text_completion.caption: Text Completion

sentiment_analysis.name: sentiment_analysis
sentiment_analysis.description: Classify the sentiment of a text, that is, a positive movie review.
sentiment_analysis.caption: Sentiment Analysis

content_moderation_skill.name: content_moderation_skill
content_moderation_skill.description: Avoiding the generation of harmful, inappropriate, or sensitive content.
content_moderation_skill.caption: Content Moderation

inference_deduction.name: inference_deduction
inference_deduction.description: Making logical inferences based on provided information.
inference_deduction.caption: Inference and Deduction

fact_extraction.name: fact_extraction
fact_extraction.description: Capability to identify and extract factual information from text documents or knowledge bases, including entities, relationships, and key data points.
fact_extraction.caption: Fact Extraction

information_retrieval_synthesis_search.name: information_retrieval_synthesis_search
information_retrieval_synthesis_search.description: Capability to perform efficient and accurate searches within large textual databases based on various criteria, including keywords, semantic meaning, or complex queries.
information_retrieval_synthesis_search.caption: Search

style_adjustment.name: style_adjustment
style_adjustment.description: Modifying the tone or style of generated text to suit specific audiences or purposes.
style_adjustment.caption: Tone and Style Adjustment

question_answering.name: question_answering
question_answering.description: System capability to understand questions and provide accurate, relevant answers by analyzing available information sources.
question_answering.caption: Question Answering

model_feature_extraction.name: model_feature_extraction
model_feature_extraction.description: Representing parts of text with vectors to be used as input to other tasks.
model_feature_extraction.caption: Model Feature Extraction

story_generation.name: story_generation
story_generation.description: Generating a piece of text given a description or a first sentence to complete.
story_generation.caption: Story Generation

language_translation.name: language_translation
language_translation.description: Capabilities for handling multiple languages, including translation and multilingual text processing.
language_translation.caption: Language Translation and Multilingual Support

topic_labeling.name: topic_labeling
topic_labeling.description: Classifying a text as belong to one of several topics, which can be used to tag a text.
topic_labeling.caption: Topic Labelling and Tagging

document_passage_retrieval.name: document_passage_retrieval
document_passage_retrieval.description: Capability to identify and retrieve relevant documents or text passages based on specific criteria or queries from a larger collection of texts.
document_passage_retrieval.caption: Document and Passage Retrieval

problem_solving.name: problem_solving
problem_solving.description: Assisting with solving problems by generating potential solutions or strategies.
problem_solving.caption: Problem Solving

poetry_writing.name: poetry_writing
poetry_writing.description: Composing poems, prose, or other forms of creative literature.
poetry_writing.caption: Poetry and Creative Writing

information_retrieval_synthesis.name: information_retrieval_synthesis
information_retrieval_synthesis.description: Capabilities for retrieving relevant information from various sources and synthesizing it into coherent, contextually appropriate responses. This includes searching, extracting, combining, and presenting information in a meaningful way.
information_retrieval_synthesis.caption: Information Retrieval and Synthesis

text_classification.name: text_classification
text_classification.description: Capabilities for classifying and categorizing text into predefined categories or labels.
text_classification.caption: Text Classification

translation.name: translation
translation.description: Converting text from one language to another while maintaining meaning and context.
translation.caption: Translation

analytical_reasoning.name: analytical_reasoning
analytical_reasoning.description: Capabilities for performing logical analysis, inference, and problem-solving tasks.
analytical_reasoning.caption: Analytical and Logical Reasoning

contextual_comprehension.name: contextual_comprehension
contextual_comprehension.description: Understanding the context and nuances of text input to provide relevant responses.
contextual_comprehension.caption: Contextual Comprehension

natural_language_generation.name: natural_language_generation
natural_language_generation.description: Natural Language Generation (NLG) describes the ability to generate human-like text from structured data or other inputs.
natural_language_generation.caption: Natural Language Generation

user_adaptation.name: user_adaptation
user_adaptation.description: Tailoring responses based on user preferences, history, or context.
user_adaptation.caption: User Adaptation

semantic_understanding.name: semantic_understanding
semantic_understanding.description: Grasping the meaning and intent behind words and phrases.
semantic_understanding.caption: Semantic Understanding

style_transfer.name: style_transfer
style_transfer.description: Rewriting text to match the style of a given reference text while preserving the original content.
style_transfer.caption: Text Style Transfer

sentence_similarity.name: sentence_similarity
sentence_similarity.description: Capability to analyze and determine the semantic similarity between sentences, supporting tasks like search, matching, and content comparison.
sentence_similarity.caption: Sentence Similarity

fact_verification.name: fact_verification
fact_verification.description: Verifying facts and claims given a reference text.
fact_verification.caption: Fact and Claim Verification

nlp.caption: Natural Language Processing

images_computer_vision.name: images_computer_vision
images_computer_vision.description: Images / Computer Vision tasks are the application of computational techniques to the analysis and synthesis of images.

depth_estimation.name: depth_estimation
depth_estimation.description: Predicting the distance or depth of objects within a scene from a single image or multiple images.
depth_estimation.caption: Depth Estimation

image_classification.name: image_classification
image_classification.description: Assigning labels or categories to images based on their visual content.
image_classification.caption: Image Classification

image_feature_extraction.name: image_feature_extraction
image_feature_extraction.description: Identifying and isolating key characteristics or patterns from an image to aid in tasks like classification or recognition.
image_feature_extraction.caption: Image Feature Extraction

image_generation.name: image_generation
image_generation.description: Creating new images from learned patterns or data using machine learning models.
image_generation.caption: Image Generation

image_segmentation.name: image_segmentation
image_segmentation.description: Assigning labels or categories to images based on their visual content.
image_segmentation.caption: Image Segmentation

image_to_3d.name: image_to_3d
image_to_3d.description: The process of converting a 2D image into a 3D representation or model, often by inferring depth and spatial relationships.
image_to_3d.caption: Image-to-3D

image_to_image.name: image_to_image
image_to_image.description: Transforming one image into another using a learned mapping, often for tasks like style transfer, colorization, or image enhancement.
image_to_image.caption: Image-to-Image

keypoint_detection.name: keypoint_detection
keypoint_detection.description: Identifying and locating specific points of interest within an image or object.
keypoint_detection.caption: Keypoint Detection

mask_generation.name: mask_generation
mask_generation.description: Producing segmented regions in an image to highlight specific areas or objects, typically represented as separate layers or overlays.
mask_generation.caption: Mask Generation

object_detection.name: object_detection
object_detection.description: Identifying and locating specific objects within an image or video, often by drawing bounding boxes around them.
object_detection.caption: Object Detection

video_classification.name: video_classification
video_classification.description: Assigning labels or categories to entire videos or segments based on their visual and audio content.
video_classification.caption: Video Classification

images_computer_vision.caption: Images / Computer Vision

audio.name: audio
audio.description: Audio tasks are the application of computational techniques to the analysis and synthesis of audio data.

audio_classification.name: audio_classification
audio_classification.description: Assigning labels or classes to audio content based on its characteristics.
audio_classification.caption: Audio Classification

audio_to_audio.name: audio_to_audio
audio_to_audio.description: Transforming audio through various manipulations including cutting, filtering, and mixing.
audio_to_audio.caption: Audio to Audio

audio.caption: Audio

tabular_text.name: tabular_text
tabular_text.description: Tabular / Text tasks are the application of computational techniques to the analysis and synthesis of tabular data and text.

tabular_classification.name: tabular_classification
tabular_classification.description: Classifying data based on attributes using classical machine learning approaches.
tabular_classification.caption: Tabular Classification

tabular_regression.name: tabular_regression
tabular_regression.description: Predicting numerical values based on tabular attributes and features.
tabular_regression.caption: Tabular Regression

tabular_text.caption: Tabular / Text

analytical_skills.name: analytical_skills
analytical_skills.description: Analytical skills encompass a range of capabilities that involve logical reasoning, problem-solving, and the ability to process and interpret complex data.

code_optimization.name: code_optimization
code_optimization.description: Rewriting and optimizing existing code through refactoring techniques.
code_optimization.caption: Code Refactoring and Optimization

code_templates.name: code_templates
code_templates.description: Automatically filling in code templates with appropriate content.
code_templates.caption: Code Template Filling

code_to_docstrings.name: code_to_docstrings
code_to_docstrings.description: Generating natural language documentation for code segments.
code_to_docstrings.caption: Code to Docstrings

coding_skills.name: coding_skills
coding_skills.description: Capabilities for code generation, documentation, and optimization.
coding_skills.caption: Coding Skills

text_to_code.name: text_to_code
text_to_code.description: Translating natural language instructions into executable code.
text_to_code.caption: Text to Code

geometry.name: geometry
geometry.description: Solving geometric problems and spatial reasoning tasks.
geometry.caption: Geometry

math_word_problems.name: math_word_problems
math_word_problems.description: Solving mathematical exercises presented in natural language format.
math_word_problems.caption: Math Word Problems

mathematical_reasoning.name: mathematical_reasoning
mathematical_reasoning.description: Capabilities for solving mathematical problems and proving theorems.
mathematical_reasoning.caption: Mathematical Reasoning

pure_math_operations.name: pure_math_operations
pure_math_operations.description: Executing pure mathematical operations, such as arithmetic calculations.
pure_math_operations.caption: Pure Mathematical Operations

theorem_proving.name: theorem_proving
theorem_proving.description: Proving mathematical theorems using computational methods.
theorem_proving.caption: Automated Theorem Proving

analytical_skills.caption: Analytical skills

retrieval_augmented_generation.name: retrieval_augmented_generation
retrieval_augmented_generation.description: Retrieval Augmented Generation tasks are the application of computational techniques to the analysis and synthesis of data from multiple modalities.

document_or_database_question_answering.name: document_or_database_question_answering
document_or_database_question_answering.description: Document or database question answering is the process of retrieving and using information from a document or database to answer a specific question.
document_or_database_question_answering.caption: Document or Database Question Answering

generation_of_any.name: generation_of_any
generation_of_any.description: Generation of any is augmenting the creation of text, images, audio, or other media by incorporating retrieved information to improve or guide the generation process.
generation_of_any.caption: Generation of Any

document_retrieval.name: document_retrieval
document_retrieval.description: Document retrieval is the process of retrieving relevant documents from a collection based on a specific query, typically through indexing and search techniques.
document_retrieval.caption: Document Retrieval

indexing.name: indexing
indexing.description: Depth estimations the task of predicting the distance or depth of objects within a scene from a single image or multiple images.
indexing.caption: Indexing

retrieval_of_information.name: retrieval_of_information
retrieval_of_information.description: Retrieval of information is the process of fetching relevant data or documents from a large dataset or database based on a specific query or input.
retrieval_of_information.caption: Retrieval of information

retrieval_of_information_search.name: retrieval_of_information_search
retrieval_of_information_search.description: Search is the process of exploring a dataset or index to find relevant information or results based on a given query.
retrieval_of_information_search.caption: Search

retrieval_augmented_generation.caption: Retrieval Augmented Generation

multi_modal.name: multi_modal
multi_modal.description: Multi-modal tasks are the application of computational techniques to the analysis and synthesis of data from multiple modalities.

any_to_any.name: any_to_any
any_to_any.description: Converting between any supported modalities (text, image, audio, video, or 3D).
any_to_any.caption: Any to Any Transformation

audio_processing.name: audio_processing
audio_processing.description: Capabilities for processing audio, including speech synthesis and recognition.
audio_processing.caption: Audio Processing

speech_recognition.name: speech_recognition
speech_recognition.description: Converting spoken language into written text.
speech_recognition.caption: Automatic Speech Recognition

text_to_speech.name: text_to_speech
text_to_speech.description: Converting text into natural-sounding speech audio.
text_to_speech.caption: Text to Speech

image_processing.name: image_processing
image_processing.description: Capabilities for processing and generating images from various inputs and generating textual descriptions of visual content.
image_processing.caption: Image Processing

image_to_text.name: image_to_text
image_to_text.description: Generating textual descriptions or captions for images.
image_to_text.caption: Image to Text

text_to_3d.name: text_to_3d
text_to_3d.description: Generating 3D objects or scenes based on textual descriptions.
text_to_3d.caption: Text to 3D

text_to_image.name: text_to_image
text_to_image.description: Generating images based on textual descriptions or instructions.
text_to_image.caption: Text to Image

text_to_video.name: text_to_video
text_to_video.description: Generating video content based on textual descriptions or instructions.
text_to_video.caption: Text to Video

visual_qa.name: visual_qa
visual_qa.description: Answering questions about images using natural language.
visual_qa.caption: Visual Question Answering

multi_modal.caption: Multi-modal
